description: Mukhyamantri Arogya Artham Yojana provides cashless treatment for serious ailments for low-income families in Gujarat.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families with annual income below Rs. 1.2 lakh

special_notes: Focus on critical illnesses like cancer and heart diseases
